venue.name: University of Connecticut Greater Hartford Campus

item.description:
This sounds like a fun night in West Hartford, if you aren't going to Black Rock. It is in the auditorium at UCONN's WH campus...see flier info below...
-----------
Music, dance, poetry, door prizes, and more...
DATE: Friday, March 19, 2010
TIME: 7:00 PM to 9:30 PM
LOCATION: UCONN West Hartford Campus Auditorium, 1800 Asylum Ave. West Hartford, CT
This activity is free of charge, but we will be expecting your generous donations to the American Red Cross
MORE: werner.oyanadel@cga.ct.gov


An evening dedicated to the Chilean people affected by the 8.8 earthquakes and tsunami that occurred on Saturday, February 27, 2010.


Join Our Mailing List!
The Latino & Puerto Rican Affairs Commission
18-20 Trinity Street
Hartford, Connecticut 06106
(860) 240-8330
item.name: Latin Evening in Solidarity with Chile
